The Electric Book Workflow

You’re looking at a template home page for a series of books. It’s created with our open-source Electric Book Workflow. We developed this workflow at Electric Book Works for our own publishing. It lets you store books in plain text with great version control, and output various formats quickly, such as website versions, ebooks and print editions.

With some technical expertise, you can use it, too. See the template in action as a website, and download the PDF, EPUB or MOBI versions.

A little book in our Classic theme, including typography examples and a guide to markdown.

All the books in a series can share the same parent design (created with CSS), but they can also have their own styles in addition.

If you’re creating one or more books in a series, this index page is a good place to keep information about the books, like basic metadata and marketing copy. It won’t be included in the output versions of your books (e.g. the print PDF or epub), but it can be a landing page for a series website.
